full_summary:
# Annual Fuel Tank Inspection Services at RCMP Detachments in Alberta

**Contract Title:** Annual Fuel Tank Inspection Services at RCMP Detachments in Alberta
**Reference Number:** cb-5774-98346975
**Contracting Entity:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
**Date of Publication:** May 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 22, 2023, 16:00:00
**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is open to businesses participating in the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).
**Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
**Regions of Delivery:** Alberta, Canada

## Service Description

The RCMP requires a service contract to supply labor, supervision, transportation, materials, tools, and equipment for the annual inspection of fuel storage tanks at RCMP detachments in Alberta. The contract will be awarded for a 24-month period with an option to extend for up to two additional 1-year periods.

## Security Requirements

The contract includes security requirements, which mandate that all personnel working on site must have a Facility Access with Escort security clearance, verified by the RCMP's Personnel Security Unit (PSU).

## Selection Criteria

Bids must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria and comply with the requirements of the Request for Proposal (RFP). The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

## Tender Requirements

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

## Contract Status

The contract status is expired.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Debbie McPherson at (639) 625-3567 or debbie.mcpherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
